channel.title: [Neutral social] The Silenced
channel.description:
>**Passive: Bide time** Any night you stay in your room, for any reason, you will be immune to death **Day ability: Intercept** The next 2 players to send whispers will fail to send the whispers and be silenced for 15 seconds. You will then read the message they intended to send. -3 uses **Day ability: Manual Silence** Same as distract. -3 uses **Night ability: Gag order** Choose 3 words of 2 letters each. The next day, anyone who includes at least one of the words in a message will unknowingly have no one else see the message.
goal: Live to see the blue dragon fall
Inspired by the with doctor (some other class I saw on the forums)

item.title: [Neutral social] The Silenced
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Passive: Bide time
Any night you stay in your room, for any reason, you will be immune to death
Day ability: Intercept
The next 2 players to send whispers will fail to send the whispers and be silenced for 15 seconds. You will then read the message they intended to send. -3 uses
Day ability: Manual Silence
Same as distract. -3 uses
Night ability: Gag order
Choose 3 words of 2 letters each. The next day, anyone who includes at least one of the words in a message will unknowingly have no one else see the message.

goal: Live to see the blue dragon fall

Inspired by the with doctor (some other class I saw on the forums)

Read full topic
